UPNW 648 Stopped
UPNW train 648 is stopped north of Norwood Park due to police activity. Metra will notify commuters when this train is moving. We apologize for the inconvenience.

UPNW 648
Train #648 is operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule due to Police Activity.

Homewood Platform Elevator Out
The Homewood Platform Elevator has been placed out of service. Alternative accessible locations are the Flossmoor Station and the Calumet Station.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert ME - Homewood East Side Construction Will Begin March 13

Beginning Monday, March 13, access to the Homewood Station from the east will be closed for station construction until Summer 2024.  Access to the boarding platform will be through the Park Avenue entrance ONLY (west side of tracks).

 

Beginning, Monday, March 6, the Pace bus stop will relocate from Harwood Avenue to Park Avenue.  Please allow additional time and use caution near the work zone.

Metra Alert RI - Construction begins April 21 at 103rd Street Washington Heights Station.
Metra forces will begin work Friday, April 21 on a major rehab project at the 103rd Street/Washington Heights Station on the Rock Island Line, for more informaiton click here.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert SWS -  SWS Riders, potential for minimal delays, ongoing track repairs due to Friday's Amtrak locomotive derailment.

SWS Riders, on Tuesday May 2, Metra expects to run trains in and out of Chicago Union Station with some track changes and a potential for minimal delays due to ongoing track repairs from Friday’s Amtrak locomotive derailment.

BNSF Riders, on Tuesday May 2, Metra expects to run trains in and out of Chicago Union Station with some track changes and a potential for minimal delays due to ongoing track repairs from Friday’s Amtrak locomotive derailment.
